hello!

welcome to the homepage for evan pavlica.

I am a Los Angeles based full-stack web developer with experience in Ruby on Rails, Angular.js, HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript. I was educated at General Assembly Los Angeles, and have a passion for code.

My design philosophy is that the user comes first. A functional, reponsive, and appealing application can engage and delight the user, and keep them coming back for more. I am motivated by solving problems, and strive to continuously improve and innovate in all of my endeavours.

I believe that open-source is the way of the future, and that the internet offers a vast number of opportunities that are ready to be taken advantage of. I enjoy playing with the latest technologies, and hope to make useful contributions to Web 3.0. One of my favorite mantras, "keep moving forward" perpetually inspires me to reach for a bigger, more beautiful tomorrow.

On this site, please find my resume and contact information, as well as links to various projects I have created. Stay tuned, as my blog is coming soon!

Thanks for visiting.
